Allright let's see now... It's been about a month since my last post, I'm thinking.
I've got three levels here, the first three in my series. You'll all whine and complain when you notice they're labeled 50-52. Well if you want to try them just rename your own and delete mine later.
Whatever.
If you hate them, or find them easy, that's great. Email tricket@... and tell him how lame Gladiator is. (don't really, Tom might get mad)
But if you like them be sure to let me know, cause then I'll know whether to program Gladiator levels or go back to writing C++.

-Trahern
"What's that? Freedan is trying out for the one on one? That's it I'm dropping out. I like my body parts where they're connected right now. " - Tristram de Taggremon.
